name: Nightmare Of Windoms
description:
This is a future "assbombing" game. Now it only shows future abilities, such as random generation and attacks. 

 It now has just one character, but then some will be added.

 P.S: Don't blame graphics (There is none of it in the game)!

Current version:  0.0.1a
